title: Liam's Mate
description: Liam Hale is a vampire healer with secrets, secrets that he has kept hidden for hundreds of years from his brothers for their own protection. He's resigned to his lot in life, to work only for the benefit of his people...until he meets mage healer Regan Taylor. Regan makes Liam want more, much more than a lonely vampire healer can ever possess.Regan Taylor is Liam's mate, but she knows she can never reveal the truth to Liam. No matter how much she wants him for her own, mating with Liam would be like signing his death warrant.Can these two healers that were meant to be together find true happiness when there are so many things keeping them apart?Author note: This is book 4 in The Vampire Coalition Series. These books are meant to be read in order and may be confusing if you don’t. The order is:Prelude – Rough Mating Of A VampireBook 1 – Ethan’s MateBook 2 – Rory’s MateBook 3 – Nathan’s MateBook 4 – Liam’s Mate
author: J.S. Scott
